description: a(n+1) = a(n)/n! if n! divides a(n) else a(n)*n!.
references: R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, Monthly unsolved problems, 1969-1995, Amer. Math. Monthly, 102 (1995), 921-926.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..190
maple: A008338 := proc(n) option remember; if n = 1 then 1 elif A008338(n-1) mod (n-1)! = 0 then A008338(n-1)/(n-1)! else A008338(n-1)*(n-1)!; fi; end;
mathematica: a[1] := 1; a[n_] := If[IntegerQ[a[n - 1]/(n - 1)! ], a[n - 1]/(n - 1)!, a[n - 1]*(n - 1)! ]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 20}] (* _Stefan Steinerberger_, Apr 08 2006 *)Transpose[NestList[{First[#]+1,If[Divisible[Last[#],First[#]!], Last[#]/First[#]!, Last[#]First[#]!]}&,{1,1},20]][[2]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 24 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
